Room.Name: East Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the eastern hallway of the great Towers of Kista.
Room.LongDescription: The Towers of Kista (or Kista Towers) were built on the ruins of the former tyranical empire that crumbled due to the resistance by factions of human, elven and dwarven fighters. The Towers were built as a general meeting place for the three races to get together and discuss the major problems of the world. The four Towers represent strength, wisdom, valor and piety.
